name: Zambies (Snowdrama)
description:
You wake up unconscious in the middle of the street, in a town you’ve never seen before. With only the clothes on your back. Everything is destroyed and there isn’t anyone to be found. As night approaches you find a flashlight in a nearby building when you hear low rumbling of creatures. Turning the corner you see a zombie! The zombie apocalypse is upon us! Before you’re seen you hide as night sets in.

A radio nearby is on and you hear there’s help coming in 3 days! Survive for 3 days, scavenge for food, weapons, and ammo in the wreckage and survive the apocalypse!

Keyboard:

  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: Aim F: 
  • Left Click: Shoot/Use
  • Pickup Items
  • Mouse Wheel: Change Hotbar Item

Gamepad:

  • Left Analog Stick: Move
  • Right Analog Stick: Aim
  • Right Trigger: Shoot/Use
  • X/Square: Pickup Items
  • Right/Left Shoulder: Change Hotbar Item
